ygData.subject: Re: Skill gain
ygData.msgSnippet: so far i have it form a more skilled blacksmith that lantern molds have given him better skill gain in the 40s range than skewers.. skewers might got some
ygData.messageBody:
so far i have it form a more skilled blacksmith that lantern molds have given
him better skill gain in the 40s range than skewers.. skewers might got some
reason be tougher (who knows for sure...)

good info on the Freeport vs Akanon pricing... not sure how to improve
faction with gnome merchants other than doing quests...

i was informed that studs require a file mold (found in freeport or just
outside kaladim gates) and metal bits to make a file then put metal bits and
file together to get stud... it was mentioned that a skill of around 40 to 50
would give good results on stud making...

a skill of around 60 to 80 starts giving good results on making banded
armor...

still no confirmation on if you really can make plate.. but i was wondering
just exactly what a folded metal sheet is for? <evil grin>
